mdRecord.dcterms:title: Freezer Shirt Factory
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Photo taken in 1937 with a description that reads, "Freezer shirt factory was one of the first industries in Floyd." This building was renovated by the Winter Sun clothing company in the 90's, and has since housed numerous businesses, including Winter Sun, Cafe Del Sol, and Dogtown Roadhouse pizza restaurant.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Textile industry
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
